content.query:
use oxemarine_ldw
GO


CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_device
@device varchar(10),
@year varchar(4),
@month varchar(2),
@day varchar(2)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt nvarchar(max),
            @drop_sql_stmt   nvarchar(max),
            @UniqueNumber    varchar(20) = (select cast(CONVERT (TIME, SYSDATETIME()) as varchar(20)))

            set @UniqueNumber = replace(replace(@UniqueNumber,':','_'),'.','_')

    set @create_sql_stmt =
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.device_' + @device + '_' + @year + '_' + @month + '_' + @day + '_' + @UniqueNumber +
        ' WITH
            (
                DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,
                LOCATION = ''silver/DEVICE/Device=' + @device + '/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + '/day=' + @day + '/' + @UniqueNumber + ''',
                FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
            )
        AS
        
        
        SELECT
    device,
    year,
    month,
    day,
    [timestamp]
--ActualPressure
      ,[PressureSource]
      ,[AtmosphericPressure]
      ,[FuelRailPressure]
--ActuatorCommand
      ,[GearCommand]      
      ,[ThrottleCommand]  
--CogSogRapidUpdate      
      ,[CourseOverGround]   
      ,[CourseOverGround_deg] 
      ,[SpeedOverGround]    
      ,[SpeedOverGround_kn]
--EngineParametersDynamic      
      ,[EngineInstance]     = case when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then 1
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then 2
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then 3
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then 4
                              else null
                              end
      ,[EngineOilPressure]  = case when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then [EngineOilPressure0]
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then [EngineOilPressure1]
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then [EngineOilPressure2]
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then [EngineOilPressure3]
                              else null
                              end
      ,[EngineOilTemp]     
      ,[EngineCoolantTemp] 
      ,[BatteryVoltage]    
      ,[FuelRate]          
      ,[TotalEngineHours]   
      ,[EngineLoad]         
--EngineParametersRapid
      ,[EngineSpeed]
      ,[BoostPressure]
      ,[PttTrim]
--OxeProprietary1 
      ,[ActualClutchSlip]
      ,[ControlheadPosition]
      ,[PropellerSpeed]
      ,[RequestClutchSlip]
--OxeProprietary4
      ,[GpcState]
      ,[GpcDuty]
      ,[GpcModuleFaults]
--PcmFeedback
      ,[PortCylinderPosition]
      ,[StbdCylinderPosition]
--PositionRapidUpdate
      ,[Latitude]       
      ,[Longitude]     
--ProductInformation     
      ,[EngineModel]     =  case   when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then ''OXE300''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then ''OXE300''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then ''OXE300''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then ''OXE300''
                              else ''OXE PV780''
                              end
      ,[EngineSwVersion]  = case   when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then ''SWFL-000029B8-023.013.000''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then ''SWFL-000029B8-023.013.000''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then ''SWFL-000029B8-023.013.000''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then ''SWFL-000029B8-023.013.000''
                              else ''02.09.23019''
                              end  
      ,[EngineFwVersion] = case    when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then ''30022124-0050001-22132''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then ''30022124-0050001-22132''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then ''30022124-0050001-22132''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then ''30022124-0050001-22132''
                              else ''02.09.23019''
                              end
      ,[EngineSerialnumber] = case when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then ''3000206''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then ''3000184''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then ''3000206''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then ''3000206''
                              else ''27''
                              end
--TemperatureExtendedRange
      ,[TemperatureSource]
      ,[EngineRoomTemp]
      ,[ExhaustGasTemp]
      ,[IntakeManifoldTemp]
      ,[FuelTemp]
      ,[EcuTemp]
      ,[CompressorOutTemp]
--TransmissionParametersDynamic
      ,[GearboxOilPressure]
      ,[GearboxGear]
      ,[GearboxOilTemp]
--TripParametersEngine    
      ,[FuelUsed]          
      ,[FuelRateAverage]    

        FROM bronze.vw_device
        WHERE   device = ''' + @device + '''
            AND year   = ''' + @year   + '''
            AND month  = ''' + @month  + '''
            AND day    = ''' + @day    + '''' ;

    --print(@create_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt

    SET @drop_sql_stmt =
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.device_' + @device + '_' + @year + '_' + @month + '_' + @day  + '_' + @UniqueNumber;

    --print(@drop_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt


END;
